   sphinx-quickstart on Fri Apr  5 22:42:02 2024.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to LLMrec's documentation!
==================================
LLMrec is a recommendation system that uses large language models to augment the training data of a collaborative filtering model. This documentation documents the API of the LLMrec package.


..  seealso::
    we provide a prepared augmented dataset for BooksCrossing. You can download it from `here <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1J9Q6Q6Q6J9Q6Q6Q6J9Q6Q6Q6J9Q6Q6Q6/view?usp=sharing>`_.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Contents:

   API/train
   API/test
   API/metrics
   API/model
   API/LLM_augmentation
   API/modules
